alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 11:18AM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. For the Lumber River...including Pembroke, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Nichols, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lumber River Near Lumberton. * WHEN...From this evening to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Low land flooding will occur along the river. The flood waters may affect some residential property as water backs up into the drainage ditches in the city. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 13.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by this evening.
